title: Three bodies found in Kalat - Pakistan - DAWN.COM
content:
KHUZDAR: Three bodies were found in Kalat on Tuesday, officials said.

Residents of Kohak area of Mangochar informed the law enforcement agencies about the bodies.

Two of them were identified as Abdul Salam Muhammad Shahi and Safiullah. The bodies were handed over to the families.

Published in Dawn, July 30th, 2025
